content.rendered:
YORK STREET SPA AVEDA FACIAL: Nourish Your Skin, Elevate Your Beauty

Welcome to the York Street Spa’s Aveda Facial experience, where we invite you to embark on a journey of skincare excellence and rejuvenation. As an Aveda Lifestyle Salon and Spa located in the heart of the Byward Market in Ottawa, we proudly offer Aveda’s renowned facial treatments, designed to enhance the health and radiance of your skin.

Tulasara Experience

Restore your skin to its healthy balance with our Tulasara Experience Facial. This customized facial is a harmonious blend of nature's power and advanced technology. It includes extensive stress-relieving massage techniques targeted to your specific skin type.

75 MIN

$155

Results & Recovery

Experience the fusion of result-focused facial techniques, green chemistry, and skin-enhancing massage with our Results & Recovery treatment. Our skilled therapists will target signs of aging, acne, and sun damage to retexture, lift, firm, calm, and clear your skin, leaving it rejuvenated and radiant.

75 MIN

$180

Skin Renewing Facial

Achieve age recovery with our Skin Renewing Facial, featuring dual exfoliation, line minimizing, and lifting and firming massage techniques customized to focus on specific areas of concern. This treatment quenches, smoothens, and tightens the skin, with recommended monthly maintenance for optimal results.

75 MIN

$240

Primary Facial

Ideal as a treatment between full facial treatments, our Primary Facial is perfect for maintaining healthy, balanced skin. This targeted facial does not include aromatherapy or massage elements and is suitable for younger individuals or those who prefer a modest facial service.

45 mins

$105

Enhance Your Facial Experience with Add-Ons:

Perfecting Plant Peel

his thermal re-texturizing treatment smooths fine lines, wrinkles, and pore size, restoring youthful radiance without redness or irritation.

30 MINS

$80

or ADD TO ANY FACIAL

$60

Restorative Eye Therapy

Reduce tension and revitalize the skin around your eyes with an instant eye lift. This treatment helps reduce fine lines, puffiness, and dark circles, leaving your eyes brighter and healthier.

$45

Add On Aroma Wrap

Transform your facial into complete face and body rejuvenation with an Ayurvedic-style dry brushing, aromatic oil blend, and comforting wrap of cotton blankets.

$78

On our York Street Spa Aveda Facial page, you’ll find detailed information about our range of Aveda Facial treatments, including descriptions, benefits, and pricing. Whether you’re looking for a quick refresh or a comprehensive skincare experience in the heart of Ottawa’s Byward Market, we have the perfect Aveda Facial for you.

Take the first step toward healthier, more radiant skin by booking your York Street Spa Aveda Facial appointment with us. Let Aveda’s holistic approach and our skilled estheticians at York Street Spa elevate your beauty and renew your skin’s vitality in the heart of Ottawa.

Book your facial appointment now to get the best!
